Radistor ducks under it and reaches up, attempting to grab Gemini Dragon's =
neck to break it and end this sad excuse for a gestalt once and for all...
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 8:15 AM
  Subject: Re: =
The D.E.D are back./Shockwave talk...


  Gemini Dragon roars once again as=
 it flys over Radistor once again 
  and then laughs as it hears Radistors =
excuse.

  Gemini Dragon: "You lie. If you are a Maximal then you would hav=
e 
  known of all of its alliances, if you are a maximal you are an 
  unlo=
yal one. For this you die now!"

  With those words Gemini Dragon unleashes=
 an energized beam of fire, 
  liquid nitrogen, and electricty which ten co=
mbine to form a large and 
  powerful beam of all three directed at Radisto=
r.

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > Radis=
tor knew this was coming, and actually jumped over Hot Rod and 
  landed to=
 the other side of him. Then he spun around and looked down 
  at Hot Rod a=
gain.
  > 
  > Radistor: We were just helping out our friends in the Allian=
ce, 
  whom Radistor has aboard himself right now. We were attacking the 
 =
 Chivtrons because they have within their group a certain ex Maximal 
  nam=
ed Arrow. He betrayed the Maximals, and us Radicons saw it fit to 
  destro=
y him. We had no idea you Chivtrons were allied with the 
  Maximals...
  >=

aughed as Radistor was set ablaze. Quickly he 
  swept

him and unleashed two highly explosive fireballs at 
  him

s two beams of liquid nitrogen.
